PPLoc: available on company's internal shared drive
activities: NTR Metals receives and processes personal data consisting of digitized images of employees from safety cameras in NTR Metals’ facilities.
personaldata: digitized data consisting of employee images from safety cameras in NTR Metals’ facilities collected for purposes of company safety and security.
recoursemech: Any questions or concerns regarding the use or disclosure of personal information should be directed to the NTR Metals International LLC office and the local manager at the address given below. NTR Metals International and the local manager will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of personal information in accordance with the principles contained in NTR Metals’ Privacy Policy for Employee Data. For complaints that cannot be resolved between NTR Metals and the complainant, NTR Metals International LLC has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European data protection authorities (DPAs) to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
